15: <degrees> degrees to the left of front
just off front to the left
30: a bit to the left front
45: a bit to the left of forward
not quite perpendicular to the left
75: heavily biased to the left front
105: a bit behind to the left
165: nearing directly behind on the left
195: nearing directly behind on the right
255: a bit behind to the right
285: heavily biased to the right front
315: a bit to the right of forward
not quite perpendicular to the right
330: slightly to the right of forward
345: <degrees> degrees to the right of front
just shy of directly ahead on the right
nearly front but to the right

framings.name: close

Near view that isolates the objects from their surroundings.

animations.name: zoom_in
descriptions: The camera zooms in, bringing the objects closer visually.
Camera movement that reduces the distance to the objects, magnifying them.
Zoom in to focus more closely on the objects, enlarging their image.

Zooming in to highlight details of the objects, filling the frame.
The objects become more prominent as the camera zooms in.
Decreasing the view's breadth to magnify the objects within the frame.
Focal length decreases, enlarging the objects' appearance in the viewfinder.
Zooming in enhances the objects, making them the central focus of the frame.
The camera closes in on the objects, magnifying their details.
instructions: Zoom in to make the objects appear closer and larger in the frame.
